did.unittitle: W. N. Gatens letter to C. D. Teel
did.abstract: Letter from W. N. Gatens, Salem, Oregon, to C. D. Teel, Echo, Oregon, 1 p, 7 August 1907, regarding Teel's appointment as delegate to the National Irrigation Congress to be held in Sacramento, California, in September.

scopecontent.p: Letter from W. N. Gatens, Salem, Oregon, to C. D. Teel, Echo, Oregon, 1 p, 7 August 1907, regarding Teel's appointment as delegate to the National Irrigation Congress to be held in Sacramento, California, in September.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: W. N. Gatens letter to C. D. Teel, Mss 1500, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.
